metadata.title: CVE-2021-28651 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.15 and 5.x before 5.0.6. Due to a buffer-management bug, it allows a denial of service. When resolving a request with the urn: scheme, the parser leaks a small amount of memory. However, there is an unspecified attack methodology that can easily trigger a large amount of memory consumption.

criterions.comment: squid package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.13-1ubuntu4.1').
